title: wrong foler name containing umlaut in safari
body:
### expected behaviour
working with safari on a mac ml
a folder with an german umlaut contains a picture.
in the picture gallery the folder should contain the picture

### actual behaviour
only on safari, it tested it on mac ml and ipad
if the folder â€žmuãÿeâ€œ in the picture gallery is opened with safari, it shows the foldername â€žmu%c3%9feâ€œ and no picture could be seen.
done the same on a mac with ff or chrome the folder â€žmuãÿeâ€œ is schown and the picture could be seen as aspected.

### steps to reproduce
1. create a folder with ãœã„ã–ãÿ in the name with safari
2. change to the folder
3. upload a picture
4. go to pictures
5. change to the folder
6. folder name ist strange an no picture is shown
7. open ff or chrome
8. go to pictures
9. open the folder
10. see good folder name and a picture

### server configuration
operating system: freebsd 9.1 rel. p-4

web server: apache2.2.21

database: mysql 5.5.32

php version: 5.4.17

owncloud version: 5.0.9

### client configuration
browser:	safari (bad)
		firefox (good)
		chrome (good)

operating system: osx 10.8.4

### logs

```
insert your webserver log here
```

#### owncloud log (data/owncloud.log)
```
nothing spe
```

insert your browser log here, this could for example include:
